addMultipleRiskScores(address[],uint8[]).details: Add the Risk Score at index to Account at index in array. Restricted to Risk Admins.

params._accounts: address array upon which to apply the Risk Score

addRiskScoreToMultipleAccounts(address[].details: Add the Risk Score to each address in array. Restricted to Risk Admins.

params._accounts: address array upon which to apply the Risk Score

addScore(address,uint8).details: Add the risk score to the account. Restricted to the owner

confirmDataProvider(uint8).details: Part of the two step process to set a new Data Provider within a Protocol AppManager

confirmOwner().details: This function confirms a new appManagerAddress that was put in storage. It can only be confirmed by the proposed address

constructor.details: Constructor that sets the app manager address used for permissions. This is required for upgrades.

params._dataModuleAppManagerAddress: address of the owning app manager

getRiskScore(address).details: Get the risk score for the account. Restricted to the owner

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proposeOwner(address).details: This function proposes a new owner that is put in storage to be confirmed in a separate process

removeScore(address).details: Remove the risk score for the account. Restricted to the owner

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

version().details: Get the version of the contract
